home.title: Choan-bûn chò FRONT-END khai-hoat, chú-iàu ēng
home.description_a: Lēng-gōa mā liáu-kái chiah ê ki-su̍t:
home.description_b: Mā ū chhú-lí chu-liāu-khò͘ ê keng-giām:

about.title: Góa hō-chò Kán Ûi-iū
description: Góa taⁿ tú khai-sí teh o̍h
. Chiap-chhiok sin ê ki-su̍t tùi góa lâi kóng chin chhù-bī. Chit-má chú-iàu ēng
teh chò bāng-chām: bo̍k-chêng ê sêng-kó pau-koah chit ê bāng-chām kap góa kî-thaⁿ ê choan-àn. Bī-lâi hi-bāng ē-tàng ha̍k-si̍p pa̍t-khoán ê JavaScript frameworks, chhin-chhiūⁿ
. Tong-jiân mā ǹg-bāng ē-tàng chìn chi̍t pō͘ lâi o̍h BACK-ENG ê ki-su̍t, chhin-chhiūⁿ
description_b: to challenge myself with problem solving. Feel free to check out my Codewars profile.
description_c: Outside of coding, I am interested in
. I speak Taiwanese, Mandarin Chinese, English, a bit of French, and some
—an indigenous language of Taiwan. Since 2021, I’ve also been contributing to the
, supporting language revitalization and free knowledge sharing.

project_a.label: 10 TIÁM PÒAⁿ
project_a.description: Che sī gún sè-hàn sî iōng khe-chí-phang lâi teh sńg chhit-thô ê. Sī ēng kán-tan ê JavaScript só͘ siat-kè ê.

project_b.label: CHHŌE TÂI-THIH
project_b.description: Khí chi̍t chōa tē-chí tio̍h ē-tàng chhōe tio̍h lī hia siōng kīn ê Tâi-thih hóe-chhia-thâu. Chiap OpenStreetMap ê tē-tô͘ chu-liāu lâi pí-tùi Tâi-thih chhia-chām ê ūi-tì.

project_c.label: KÁM HÓ-THIⁿ
project_c.description: Ē-tàng sûi-sî chhâ jīm-hô siâⁿ-chhī ê thiⁿ-khì. Liān-si̍p chiap OpenWeather ê API.

projects.title: CHOAN-ÀN
projects.description: Liâm-mi ē koh keng-sin kî-thaⁿ choan-àn.
